name: Monsters World Cup Brazil
description:
Are you ready for the football FIFA World Cup 2014 games?

Well there had been all kinds of special preparations in Brazil for this big World Event. All the stuff you can think, from Stadiums, full cities, hotels, markets to t-Shirts, balls, grass, decorations and music all these had been specially taken care of in order to be perfect.

Time has come, and you can finally support your favorite team in world cup Brazil 2014.

But today you can do more than watching your favorite country playing football on TV, you can join in a Fifa world cup game like this one and get yourself into the football career, join in the journey of winning the Soccer World Cup of Brazil 2014!

Did you know that monsters around the world like to play football? Well you're going to find out that they also have their world cup tournament in Brazil this summer. Monster across the world have come to Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and other cities, to play.

Choose the team you want your monster to play, and go on the road of bringing the football world cup home and become a superstar. It won't be easy, you will have to compete against some of the most powerful countries in the world, Italy, USA, England, Spain, Russia, Mexico or Cameroon, these are just a few of the countries of monsters that you may have to play against. But if you play a lot, you'll improve your skills and you might advance from the group round, up to the final match. Try your best to defeat your enemy team in 90 minutes, or you'll have to eliminate them in the penalty shootout, which will be quite a challenge.

Here are a couple of features you’ll discover in the game:

★ 2D and 3D effects

★ Wonderful music and sound effects

★ Single Match and Tournament Game Modes

★ World cup penalty Shootout

★ Optimized for phones and tablet devices

★ Easy controls, big buttons, clean and intuitive design

★ Score and Time System

★ Easy to complicated difficulty levels

★ 32 World Cup Teams + a few more

★ Group Stages, playoff and Knockout rounds

★ Easter Eggs, Achievements and bonuses

★ FREE, no in-app purchase

Have fun with some of the most funny monster football players from all over the World!
